message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you an incredible product that I believe will meet your needs. I'm offering it for $12000. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. However, $12000 is a bit beyond my range. I'm prepared to offer $9000 for the product. Let me know if that works for you.
Thanks for your response, Bob! I appreciate your offer of $9000, but I would like to propose a price of $10500. I believe this product offers great value. Let me know if this works for you!
